title: Show Alt Text in the Sitefinity Images Module Grid
content:
Alternative Text is pretty much mandatory for images on the web, by default though, Sitefinity doesn't show this field (or provide a native sort method to find images missing it)  
  
Quick fix to add it though  
  
Just click on "Columns" and add a new "DataColumnElement"...set the fields to what you see below  
  
![Show alt text](/images/posts/show-alt-text-in-the-images-grid/alttext.png?sfvrsn=30078b66_2 "alttext")

### Update 2020: This only applies to the OLD UI, not the new AdminUI
seoDescription: Add an images Alt Text to the Sitefinity Images Module backend Grid
